level.heading: Control of school construction and repairs.
level.text: The Director of the Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs ("Director") shall have the same authority, control over, and supervision of the construction or repair of a public school building as the Director has of the construction or repair of any privately owned building.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: Law 8-131 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-529. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 27, 1990, and March 13, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 27, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-183 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.

Law 8-143 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-504, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 27, 1990, and April 10, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 26, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-199 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
